website_summaries.verdict: Because every hippie garden needs a bit of peace and love.
pros: 10-inch tall hand-painted resin, so no two are alike
cons: Some objections to his choice of all-white outfit

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Crazy Gnome Brings Happiness
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and cute garden gnome. This was purchased to leave at the gravesite for my sister’s son, who died just before birth. She is still grieving and it means a lot to her when friends and family leave special things at his grave. I leave something every Christmas and this is what I chose for this year because I think he would have been cute and crazy, just like his twin brother. She loved it. I loved it because it made her happy. High quality and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Hes so cute!
customer_reviews.text: Well-made little garden gnome! He's just the perfect size to hang out by my flower pots in front of the house to greet friends and neighbors that stop by. I do think I'm going to paint him though. He may upgrade to an orange hat and tie-dye robe ;) If I can edit my post or add pics later, I'll do it! But he's great! Happy to have him!
customer_reviews.author: SpidermansM0m

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gnome
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of gnomes (because they're simply awesome :)) This is definitely one of the better quality ones I have, will order from them again!!
customer_reviews.author: candace hladek

customer_reviews.title: So cute, but not heavy enough to stay staniding.
customer_reviews.text: We have a lot of gnomes in our garden, and I thought this was a great addition. The problem is that he is not heavy enough to stand. Every time there is wind or rain, it falls over. Daily we are going out to stand him back up! Maybe he is not meant to go outside? But he is so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Howen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for a rockin' garden.
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute. I just moved into my first house and actually have room for a large array of indoor/outdoor plants and flowers. This is my very first garden knome purchase and I think it's kinda effing perfect. Rock on! Dig it (the garden, that is....)
customer_reviews.author: Katwomandu

customer_reviews.title: Best Gnome Ever!
customer_reviews.text: George is adorable. Very light weight, so make sure to put him in a place that is sheltered from heavy winds. I use George as an indoor window direction for my front garden so I can not speak on how he holds up to weather.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS GUY!
customer_reviews.text: This guy is freakin awesome!! Thought he looked cool on line but he is even cooler in person. Totally hilarious and made a perfect Christmas present for "those" friends. So glad we got him. I was sorry to see him go.
customer_reviews.author: kasey kruft

customer_reviews.title: Love the gnome

customer_reviews.title: Cutest!!

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift

customer_reviews.title: This rock-n-roll gnome is cute.

customer_reviews.title: Know your audience
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present for a Jewish friend. He liked it. His wife immediately thought of The Grand Dragon of the KKK because the gnome was all dressed in white. I have to admit it does resemble a klan member. A tye-dye design on the shirt might have helped sell the rocker look better. We all had a big laugh over it and I am sure we will again!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Haskel

customer_reviews.title: George the Protector!

product_meta.title: GlitZGlam Rocker Gnome – “George” – This Gnome Will Rock Your Fairy Garden and Garden Gnomes 10 Inches Tall Garden Gnome Figurine
product_meta.description: George the ROCKER GNOME loves to be cool and “Rock On!” This garden gnome will be sure to put a smile on anyone’s face and rock your fairy garden and garden gnomes. George loves to be goofy and make fairies and gnomes laugh all day long. He hangs out with all fairies and gnomes in the magical enchanted kingdom. At times, you will see him playing hide and seek with the little baby gnomes and reading them stories of the enchanted kingdom. Rocker Gnome will make you smile and make sure you have a “Rock-On” day! George will be sure to put a smile on anyone’s face! This very cool gnome figurine will be the center of attention in your fairy garden, home, or office. George can withstand all the elements of mother nature, casted in high-quality resin, and hand-painted with care by our artists. Place this gnome in your fairy garden and watch the fairies dance next to him at night The design and craftsmanship are amazing and highly detailed. When you look at it closely you’ll appreciate the attention to the smallest features. Enter the world of fantasy and magic with this rocker gnome by GlitZGlam. Large size gnomes are great friends for your garden fairy figures and even get along perfectly well with pixies and sprites. This gnome stands out in the crowd and his design and pose are inviting all with a big welcome. A must-have for your miniature garden! He can be a garden gnome, lawn gnome, decorate a beautiful plant, or simply rest on the shelf next to you while you work.
feature_bullets: ROCKER GNOME – “George” – This Gnome will Rock your Fairy Garden and Garden Gnomes by GlitZGlam. 10 Inches Tall Garden Gnome Figurine

Measurements: 10H" X 8.5W" Made of top quality resin. A beautiful gnome figurine for your fairy garden and miniature garden. Does not include other figurines or accessories which might be showing in product images for display purposes
Non-Toxic and waterproof for outdoor use. Looks so cool on your bookshelf too!
Exclusive copyright design and hand painted by our artists making each and every piece 100% unique and special as no two pieces are completely identical
Great for a fairy garden, miniature garden, enchanted garden, your home, office, on a shelf next to you while you work and as a wonderful garden statue gift
